data.text: @sjurgis In your case you may transport all three of them - one stroller and seat for the infant (one of these then will go as an included 10 kg checked baggage allowance) and second car 'seat' for the child.

@sjurgis Hi!
When travelling with an infant (0-2 years of age) you may transport 10 kg checked baggage item + collapsible stroller.
When travelling with a child (2-12 years of age) you may transport collapsible stroller.
All free of charge.

data.text: @loljanordic We understand the emotion however to escape such situations and misunderstandings at the airports as you described, we kindly ask passengers to contact us. airBaltic is currently receiving and approving such requests daily for both refugee and their animal travel.

@loljanordic Hello! We are saddened to read about situation you are describing. We kindly invite such passengers to contact us beforehand in order to approve the travel if passenger does not hold some documents needed for the destination (as each country may have different entry conditions).
@SolaceTheSiren @KLM Thank you! Please DM us more details here on Twitter with the baggage irregularity reference number, we will check the current status.

data.text: @holi_anne We kindly inform you that as per our procedure, all the items found onboard are delivered to the responsible airport Lost & Found office. Thank you.

@holi_anne Hello, Holly! Thank you for the message! We would like to inform you that all items found on the plane after the flight are delivered to the Lost & Found office of the respective airport. For more information, we kindly ask you to turn to the responsible L&F office. Thank you.

We are glad to announce that as of now, airBaltic will finance a significant part of the airBaltic Pilot Academy student studies. This plan will significantly improve student payment structure: https://t.co/ipBTbw9dxT https://t.co/Fv1uq0mI8N

urls.title: Integrated airline transport pilot course (ATPL/A) - airBaltic Training
urls.description: Before applying, the candidate should make sure that their health meets Class 1 Medical Certificate requirements – the official version is available on the European Aviation Safety Agency’s website, a good explanation is available on the official website of the United Kingdom’s CAA – and should generally conform to high requirements towards a person’s health, thus existing health problems should be strictly self-assessed. Strict security checks apply as access to aerodrome infrastructure is required.

data.text: @ReedyNo7 Hello! Please DM us privately more details and booking reference number, we will check what are the options!

New route for our new base - we're excited to share that Amsterdam is joining the Tampere network! 🌍✈️ Starting from June, direct flights twice a week to this charming city that is always full of life: https://t.co/DDREsFpnOk https://t.co/QLS99GTc6S
@MiikaArponen Thank you!
@MiikaArponen Hi! You may use the form or just send it to us… here! Although our Network team are constantly reviewing and looking at new destinations, we will pass your recommendation to them!
@InnoDaniRigues Unfortunately we are not able to impact whether the e-mail from us will go to certain e-mail provider’s spam box or not, however we hear you and will pass this thread to our team!

@InnoDaniRigues Hello! Sorry to hear about such situation. We can confirm that information about this can be found during the ticket purchase, on our webpage, as well in the reminder e-mails. More details: https://t.co/FDtmFlt1IR https://t.co/x5NWRWrGUo

data.text: @symchaa Hello! Thanks for bringing this to our attention. We kindly inform you that our check-in desks open approximately 2 hours before the flight departure time. Therefore - our agents should be there within the mentioned timeframe. Our apologies for any inconveniences caused.
@CaroleKerduel We kindly ask you to send us additional information (such as your booking reference) via DM, we will check! Thank you.

Take a look inside the brain of flight coordination! 🛫 We caught our Flight dispatcher Alise before her busy workday and asked a few questions to better understand what it's like to manage airBaltics day-to-day flight operations. 
👉 Find out more: https://t.co/ncCd6Yxp6s https://t.co/c5XCkDbnPw

@MarijaSingh Thanks for your kind words! 

Get well soon! 💚

During the year 2021, the revenue of airBaltic Group reached EUR 204.1 million, up 41% compared to the previous year. We were delighted to carry 1.63 million passengers and we are looking forward to welcoming even more this year while offering 94 routes: https://t.co/6EQbwb2ZPI https://t.co/nOvo71ovYb

@CaroleKerduel Hello! Our apologies for inconveniences caused due to flight cancellation. We kindly ask you to check your e-mail/SMS where you should find out more details about your next actions. If not yet there, please contact our colleagues by calling: +371 6700 6006
@eaunina1 Labdien, atvainojamies par šo situāciju. Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par Jūsu rezervāciju, pārbaudīsim.

@Diminutivlein Well, then we will say - lai lielisks lidojums! :)

/Have a nice flight!/

@guyinsussex Hello! Flight has been delayed due to operational reasons. We apologize for the inconveniences caused. If you haven't been satisfied with our care and would like to submit us a claim afterwards, we kindly ask you to use this form: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An

data.text:
Latvian airline airBaltic invites you to join the Annual Press Conference today, on April 14, at 11:30 a.m. EEST hosted by airBaltic board members.
To join the event, click here: https://t.co/QtlhQXyQ6N https://t.co/yPhHHOgat6
@DerProfiDigga44 Hello! Currently no such plans this season however please follow our social media channels for latest news in regards to our newest route additions!
Coming tomorrow: airBaltic Annual Press Conference starting at 11:30 a.m. EEST, livestream link will be published before the conference! ⏰ https://t.co/uFUqfrZgpq

@xynamic Apologies for the confusion. It is possible that the ticket was purchased while the terminal still was North - it was changed few weeks ago due to reopening of South terminal (were airBaltic was before the pandemic).
@simonasbartkus Happy to welcome you at the HQ in Riga to answer all your questions about airBaltic strategy!
@xynamic Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please be informed that currently we are operating flights to/from London Gatwick airport's South terminal. Thank you.

@holi_anne Hello! Thanks for your question. Firstly, we are sorry to hear of such situation. In this case we kindly advise you to contact the Lost and Found office of the relevant arrival airport. Thank you.

We are proud to have received the highest ranking among Latvian brands in the European Sustainable Brand Index in the transport and travel sector! ✈️ Our airline continuously strives to be a sustainable carrier: https://t.co/ikoWdf03dQ https://t.co/H0yRcjIZay
@Partynonstop @DublinAirport Thank you for the feedback, we have passed it on to the responsible teams.
@Partynonstop @DublinAirport Please also double check the airport screens for the correct check-in zones/counters for the particular flight.

@Partynonstop @DublinAirport Good morning! Thanks for your message.
Our check-in desk at the airport opens approximately 2 hours before flight departure time. This means that our representatives should be there any second now (if not already), thanks for your patience.
@Nomissimon12 Hello, Simon! We are pleased to hear such positive words! 😊 Wishing you safe and wonderful travels! 💚✈️

@melnaabite Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you are experiencing. We kindly invite you to check your Facebook Messenger as we have provided an answer there. Thank you.

data.text: @rosme331 Aicinām skatīt konkrētā dāvanu kupona nosacījumus - daļu no tiem nav iespējams izmantot lētākajām biļešu klasēm (ķirsīšu biļetēm), kas nozīmē, ka sistēma Jums lidojumam piedāvā jau nākamo rezervācijas klasi, no kuras kupona atlaidi ir iespējams piemērot.

@rosme331 Labdien! Šiem punktiem beigsies derīguma termiņš, kas nozīmē, ka tie tiks dzēsti no Jūsu konta un vairs nebūs pieejami! Tāpēc varam aicināt tos izmantot!
https://t.co/g6JgCyhOUb

We are honoured to support the President of the Republic of Latvia Egils Levits’ visit to Moldova and deliver 5.8 tons of humanitarian relief cargo to the Ukrainian refugee center in Chisinau as well as carry refugees to their temporary home in Latvia. https://t.co/XGD8uPv7mH

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text:
During the 2022 summer season, we will offer direct flights to a total of 12 destinations from #Vilnius, Lithuania and 13 destinations from #Tallinn, Estonia!

✈️ Find a complete schedule of airBaltic flights and tickets for the destinations on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg https://t.co/SrFpeAGRTP

@L45064250 For more details (in English) regarding the current Covid-19 rules in Latvia we ask you to contact relevant country authorities.
As for vaping, to better understand the circumstances and situation, please submit us a claim via previously sent form, as smoking is not permitted.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @L45064250 Hello, sorry to hear you haven't been satisfied with our service. Please note that masks are not mandatory anymore (except for some routes), although highly recommended during the flight. If you would like to tell us more about this situation: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text: Greetings from Brussels! We are delighted to take part in @A4Europe #A4ESummit and reconnect with EU policymakers and industry leaders on current and emerging aviation topics. https://t.co/oN9ZpqDaSe
@viseryagaming 💚💚

@foluoladipo @SpaethFlies @eurowings Indeed! 👨‍✈️
https://t.co/WEGYzNixAq

@EJHarrison6 Good morning! Our apologies for this and inconveniences caused. We see that the flight departed with a 10 minute delay in the end. Fingers crossed everything goes well with the connection, if not - we will provide care and alternatives.

@Dzindzis2 Labdien, Dzintar! Informējam, ka šobrīd piedzīvojam tehniskas problēmas, kas ietekmē biļešu iegādes procesu mūsu mājas lapā. Mūsu kolēģi šobrīd strādā, lai tās atrisinātu pēc iespējas ātrāk. Aicinām mēģināt veikt rezervāciju vēlāk. Atvainojamies par sagātātajām neērtībām.
@leldeku Labrīt! Paldies par interesi! Vēlamies informēt, ka šobrīd neplānojam tiešo lidojumu atsākšanu šajā maršrutā.
@E_Stendzenieks Labdien, līdz ar akcionāru sapulces lēmumu palielināt airBaltic pamatkapitālu 2020. un 2021. gadā, Latvijas Republikas līdzdalība uzņēmumā tika palielināta līdz 97,03%.

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: airBaltic’s tenth #NFT collection is live! 🔔 The new edition of the City Collection features Gulbene #cryptoart and can now be purchased by #NFTCommmunity on @opensea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether: https://t.co/Osq7kMsWYI https://t.co/1S9HDy44aY
